amendment.description: Amendment, as modified, adds language to prohibit the use of children in Afghanistan as soldiers or combatants.
amendment.purpose: Amendments numbered 5 and 6 printed in the Congressional Record and offered en bloc to provide that the Afghan Army should prohibit the use of children as soldiers or combatants and to require the President to certify that the Afghan government is in compliance with such a prohibition.

action.text: Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A005) modified by unanimous consent. The modification seeks to remove the provisions of amendment number 6, as offered, and retain amendment number 5.
On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendments (A005) as modified Agreed to by recorded vote: 413 - 0 (Roll no. 180).
